Rion/Hysteria/Swyft

Rion:

Rion grinned at Diana, then focused his gaze and attention on the rampaging 
monster that stood before him. He raised his sword and shut his eyes as he 
cried out while slashing at the creature's head (or whatever happens to be 
within the sword's reach).

'We're gonna die...'

(Just out of curiosity, is the creature that's attacking Diana and Rion 
Megan's or someone elses?)

*****

Hysteria:

Hysteria ran through the bowels of the ship repairing what she could. Most 
of it was beyond help, but what she could fix she did. She bounced from end 
to the other. She wasn't giving up on this ship. It could survive the 
battle, it had too.

*****

Swyft: (I introduced her a while back, I'm just reactivating her now)

Swyft climbed out of the chilly water that surrounded the massive Iron Fist 
and cautiously appproached the ship. It was impressive. She rustled her 
feathers, the soft sound of metal falling against metal was a common noise 
coming from her. Her feathers were, after all, metallic. She stretched her 
wings and walked toward the door, shaking the last residue of water from her 
tired body. She stopped just outside the shield's perimiter (if it's up, if 
not she stopped just outside the door):

"Hello?"
